report.query: SELECT DISTINCT CMS.CMS_COLLATERAL_ID AS SECURITY_ID from cms_security CMS, SCI_LE_SUB_PROFILE sub_profile, sci_lsp_lmt_profile LMT, sci_lsp_appr_lmts APPR, cms_limit_security_map MAP

whereClause.mandatoryClause: CMS.CMS_COLLATERAL_ID = MAP.cms_collateral_id AND APPR.CMS_LSP_APPR_LMTS_ID = MAP.CMS_LSP_APPR_LMTS_ID AND LMT.CMS_LSP_LMT_PROFILE_ID = APPR.CMS_LIMIT_PROFILE_ID AND LMT.LLP_LE_ID = sub_profile.LSP_LE_ID AND Sub_Profile.Status ='CLOSED' AND
